ygData.subject: RE: Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know that my enchanter buddy has to be careful about when, where and how he uses his Mesmerization (Equivalent to our Lullaby). If not, he accidentally
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:08 PM 10/26/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>I haven't played any other class except a bard so I'm not familiar with all
>the spells out there. Do other classes have spells that can accidently
>cause damage to them like the Dirge can for bards?

I know that my enchanter buddy has to be careful about when, where and how
he uses his Mesmerization (Equivalent to our Lullaby). If not, he
accidentally mesmerizes himself. It's funny because sometimes he'll just
be standing there, and someone will comment "Whassa matter? Goin' to sleep
on us?" and he'll reply just as soon as he can, "As a matter of fact, yes!"

;)
Talies "C'mon ride the Train!" the Wanderer
